attributes.action: Allow free prescriptions for cancer patients
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Do you know that cancer patients have to pay for their prescriptions unless they are diagnosed as being terminally ill. Many cancer patients, like myself, have to stay on medication for a long time and it is wrong that we have to pay when other less needy people, i.e. drug addicts get their methadone etc free. As a cancer patient you are more prone to infections and frequently need extra medication that all has to be paid for.
I want a million people to sign this petition, please help.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Allow free prescriptions for cancer patients"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17545


Prime Minister's Office
